descript.abstract: This polygon data layer represents hydrography for Waupaca County, Wisconsin in 2014. It is a feature class within the geodatabase, Waupaca_HydroPoly_2014.gdb. [The hydrography coverage was created to represent rivers, water bodies and other hydrographic phenomena in Waupaca County. Hydrologic features were derived from the May 1994 flight with a flight height of 10,000 feet. The hydrologic feature layer is available in a county-wide or individual layer for each township, city, or village. The layer is based on the Waupaca County Coordinate System (WCCS).]
descript.purpose: This layer is intended for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. [Hydrology data provides consultants, planners, resource managers and other county staff with information on the location of hydrologic boundaries within Waupaca County.]
descript.supplinf: For additional information, please see original license/data sharing agreement where applicable. Augmented original metadata with UW-Madison specific elements. For dataset download , please visit http://www.co.waupaca.wi.us/landinformation/Data.aspx {The hydro layer contains basic water body classification codes. The codes are based on "Lake Shoreline Classification Study" by the Discovery Group, based out of Madison Wisconsin. Hardcopy of report is available from the Waupaca County Zoning Department. The spring of 1994 was a wet year, so the hydro layer contains many features that are no longer open water. The hydro layer also contains features that would be considered wetlands. Currently there is no code to differentiate between open water and wetland.]

idinfo.accconst: [None for off-line access. On-line access to this data through the Waupaca County Virtual Private Network is restricted to authorized users. Refer to contact person for more information on how to become an authorized user.]
idinfo.useconst: [Waupaca County G.I.S.layers are for informational purposes only and are not intended to represent evidence in title. The representations on these layers could in fact be in error and should not be relied upon as the sole determining factor in the location of any given feature. Waupaca County is not responsible for any inaccuracies contained herein.]
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.0.4322

attracc.attraccr: Attribute information remains the same as given by the author of the data.

procstep.procdesc: [Aerial Data Reduction Associates, Inc (ADR) used fully analytic stereoplotters for direct capturing of digital stereo data of hydrologic features from the 1994 1"=1,700' scale ortho photography. The planimetric mapping was built to meet all National Map Accuracy Standards for a map scale of 1"=200'.]
Exported original feature class into a new file geodatabase to maintain the original file format of the data and to conform with UW-Madison's data distribution plan.

cntorgp.cntorg: Arthur H. Robinson Map Library, UW-Madison

procstep.procdesc: Changed name of file from 'Hydro_Polygons' to Waupaca_HydroPoly_2014.
